skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 25% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns. Also fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 15%.
Places a [Revive On Death] buff and a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 2 turns.

Swaps HP with an ally. If this Champion’s HP is equal to or higher than the target’s HP after the swap, fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 40%, places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on this Champion for 2 turns, and places a [Block Damage] buff on the target ally for 1 turn. If this Champion’s HP is lower than the target’s HP after the swap, fills the target’s Turn Meter by 40%, places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on them for 2 turns, and places a [Block Damage] buff on this Champion for 1 turn. Also places to 15% [Continuous Heal] buffs on this Champion for 2 turns.
Fully heals the ally with the lowest HP whenever this Champion is killed. Heals all allies by 20% of their MAX HP and fills their Turn Meters by 15% whenever this Champion is revived.
Increases Speed in All Battles by 24%
